hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ebpm.EBPL_ID, ebpm.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_TYPE, ebpm.EBPL_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_QUICK_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_NAME_CN, ebpm.EBPL_NAME_EN, ebpm.MODIFY_TIME, eb_country.EBPL_CODE COUNTRY_CODE, eb_country.EBPL_NAME_CN COUNTRY_NAME_CN, eb_country.EBPL_NAME_EN COUNTRY_NAME_EN from EB_PLACE eb_country left join EB_PLACE ebpm on ebpm.ebpl_type='PLACE_PROVINCE' and eb_country.EBPL_CODE=ebpm.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE where eb_country.ebpl_type='PLACE_COUNTRY' <<and eb_country.ebpl_code LIKE :countryCode>> and ebpm.EBPL_CODE is not null <if is_empty(ebplCode,ebplNameCn,ebplNameEn) == false > and (1=2 <<or ebpm.ebpl_code like '%' || :ebplCode || '%' >> <<or ebpm.EBPL_NAME_CN like '%' || :ebplNameCn || '%' >> <<or ebpm.EBPL_NAME_EN like '%' || :ebplNameEn || '%' >> ) </if>
